networkSelector.text: Select which network to connect to.

leftPanelVaultBalance.text: The liquidity distribution of the vault.

vaultLockedBalance.text: The total amount of ETH locked into this vault's current round.

vaultUnlockedBalance.text: The total amount of ETH unlocked in this vault. If not withdrawn, it will become locked in the next round.

vaultStashedBalance.text: The total amount of ETH stashed in this vault from queued withdrawals. Funds will remain stashed in the vault until liquidity providers collect it.

leftPanelVaultAlpha.text: The risk level of the vault.

leftPanelVaultStrike.text: The strike level of the vault. Determines the next round's strike price.

leftPanelRoundState.text: The current state of the round

leftPanelRoundPerf.text: The [LP | OB] performance for this round.

leftPanelRoundCapLevel.text: The max percentage above the strike this round will payout.

leftPanelRoundStrikePrice.text: The basefee TWAP that determines if the options can be exercised upon settlement.

leftPanelRoundReservePrice.text: The minimum bid price per option.

leftPanelRoundTotalOptions.text: The total number of options available in the auction.

leftPanelRoundClearingPrice.text: The realized price per option from the auction

leftPanelRoundOptionsSold.text: The number of options sold in this round.

leftPanelRoundSettlementPrice.text: The basefee TWAP when the round settled.

leftPanelRoundPayout.text: The total payout for this round.

leftPanelRoundTime.text: How much time remains before the round's state can transition.

leftPanelStateTransitionButton_Open.text: Button to start the round's auction once the auction start date is reached.

leftPanelStateTransitionButton_Auctionin.text: Button to end the round's auction once the auction end date is reached.

leftPanelStateTransitionButton_Running.text: Button to settle the option round once the settlement date is reached.

actionTab_Deposit.text: Add liquidity to your unlocked balance.

actionTab_For Someone Else.text: Deposit for an account not connected.

actionTab_Withdraw.text: Remove liquidity from your unlocked balance.

actionTab_Liquidity.text: Remove liquidity from your unlocked balance.

actionTab_Queue.text: Queue a percentage of your locked balance to be stashed aside upon round settlement.

actionTab_Refund.text: Refund your bids that were not collected as premium.

actionTab_Mint.text: Convert your options into ERC-20 tokens.

actionTab_Exercise.text: Exercise all of your options for this round.

inputDepositAmount.text: Enter the amount of ETH you want to deposit.

inputDepositAddress.text: Enter the address you are depositting for.

depositButton.text: Deposits are added to a user's unlocked balance. Once the next auction starts all unlocked liquidity will become locked.

inputWithdrawalAmount.text: Enter the amount of ETH you want to withdraw.

withdrawButton.text: Withdrawals come from a user's unlocked balance.

queueSlider.text: Select the percentage of your locked balance to queue.

queueButton.text: Queue a percentage of your locked balance to become stashed upon settlement. The rest will become unlocked.

inputBidAmount.text: Enter the number of options you are bidding for. Each option is for a single unit of gas.

inputBidPrice.text: Enter the price you are bidding for each option (in GWEI).

newBidSummary.text: The total cost of this bid.

placeBidButton.text: Request transaction to bid ETH in the auction.

inputUpdateBidAmount.text: How many options this bid is for. If you wish to bid for additional options you must place a new bid.

inputUpdateBidPrice.text: Enter the new price being bid for each option (in GWEI).

updateBidSummary.text: The total cost to increase this bid.

updateBidButton.text: Update the price per option of your bid.

exerciseButton.text: Exercise all of your options (non-minted options and ERC-20 options).
